type.name: Host
type.prop: UniqueID of the host records, e.g., `151362331`.
The domain or subdomain for which host record is set, e.g., `*`, `ï¼ `.
The type of host record that is set, e.g., `A`.
The value that is set for the host record (IP address for A record, URL for URL redirects, etc.), e.g., `10.28.121.54`.
TTL value for the host record, e.g., `1799`.
